segments.text: Professor , excuse me , but I need to leave early .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I am beginning to have an asthma attack .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like someone to walk you over to the Student Health Center ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I think that I should just go home because I have some medicine there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need a ride home ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I live in the dorms across the street , so I â€™ ll be OK .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , then , hope you feel better soon . Check your e-mail for missed assignments .
segments.speaker: S2
